text: geudeul-eun hananim-eul bulsinhago halamsawon-e deul-eoganeun geosgwa huisaeng jeleul ihaenghaeya hal gos-e ileuji moshage hayeossdoda man-il neohuiga alji moshan mid-eum-eul gajin heoyaghan namseong-gwa yeoseongdeul-i eobs-eossdamyeon neohuineun geudeul eul alji moshan iyulo jeung-oseuleoun eotteon geosdeul-i neohuileul goelobhyeoss-eul geos ila geulihayeo hananim-eun geubun-i wonhaneun jamyeon nugudeun geubun-ui eunhye sog-e deulge hayeoss-euni man-il geudeul-i gubyeol-i doeeossdamyeon hananim-eun geudeul jung bulsinjadeul-ege gotongseuleoun eungbeol-eul jueoss-eul geos-ila
